item.title: News
item.description: We are working on our own full and unique adventure with one of a kind boards, cards and storylines. Our Dungeon Master will be streaming our playthrough as soon as we finish it.

item.title: New products
item.description: We have some new stuff in stock, so go check it out!

item.title: Vacation
item.description: We are going on a vacation from 20th to 30th of December so we won't be able to finish some of your orders. But be not afraid, we are going to finish them as soon as we can and notify You! Thank you for understanding and Happy Holidays!
